title: aria-activedescendant attribute
description: Identifies the currently active element when DOM focus is on a composite widget, textbox, group, or application.

assertions.title: convey the referenced element as active
assertions.rationale: A screen reader user needs to be aware of which descendant is currently active
examples: When navigating to an element with this attribute, screen readers will also announce the referenced element

assertions.title: convey when the referenced element changes
assertions.rationale: A screen reader user needs to be aware of which descendant is currently active
examples: When navigating within an element with this attribute, screen readers will also announce the referenced element as the reference changes
